name: Unmurk Demo
description:
You only see the edges of the object. Rotate the object and place the puzzle pieces in their places.

Wishlist on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1923960/Unmurk/

Controls: 
Mouse click and drag on object - rotate object.
Mouse click and drag on puzzle - move puzzle.

Thanks for playing. If you have any suggestions, please write in the comment. :)

Michal
